Retrieval and Processing of MDL SD-File Structure Data
======================================================

The script *sd_proc.py* demonstrates how to retrieve and process structure data associated
with molecules read from the specified MDL SD-file.

**Synopsis**

  :program:`python` *sd_proc.py* <SD-file>

   :linenos:
